alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:58PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CHURCHILL... NORTHWESTERN MINERAL AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM PDT... At 357 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles east of Yerington, or 31 miles south of Fallon, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wabuska, Us 95 At Lyon-Churchill Co Line, Us 95 At Mineral-Lyon Co Line, Alt U.S 95 At Lyon-Mineral Co Line, and Schurz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
